entries.a_greet: hello there... I am the antagonist leader and I am gonna attempt to convince you all to help us. will you?
entries.a_mad: you said you would help them?! die scum!
entries.a_prep: we are getting ready... it wont be much longer!
entries.a_rejected: you said no jerky... no go away before we warm up on you!
entries.a_enroute: just get us there quickly... ok?
entries.a_victory: antagonist leader doing a lil victory dance!
entries.a_yes: you answered yes! great... here is a way point... we'll be getting ready then we'll follow you over there. k? k.
entries.a_minion_1: im just a minion - go talk to the leader
entries.a_cadence_response: we gonna go and have us some fun
entries.a_thank_combat: thank you for assisting us in combat! kudos to you
entries.a_brushoff: go away. you didn't do anything to help us!
entries.a_incombat_1: stop bothering me... and this guy is already taken!
entries.a_unknown: i dunno wtf I was supposed to say here cuz I think something unloaded
entries.a_charge: you, mediator people, are bad people... DIE!
entries.a_enemy_attack: what are they doing attacking us?? to arms!!
entries.m_greet: hello hello hello. care to help us do something that you probably have no idea what you are getting yourself into?
entries.m_mad: blah blah blah - you agreed to help baddies. die!
entries.m_prep: we gettin ready... just another sec
entries.m_rejected: I am feeling rejected... boo whooo
entries.m_enroute: yes yes... we are enroute to do  something i never thought i would do...
entries.m_victory: i am mediator leader give my guys props for winning!
entries.m_yes: yes? great... we'll be over here in the corner putting on clean skivvies in case we end up in a hospital...
entries.m_cadence: we were afraid until you came...
entries.m_cadence_response: but, now, if we die, we have you to blame...
entries.m_thank_combat: gee whiz... you really helped us out. thanks man!
entries.m_brushoff: ya ya ya... we won... but you did nothing... so go away annoying person...
entries.m_incombat_5: wow... this is more fun than expected!
entries.m_unknown: brainfart ocurring... why? prolly cuz I lost track of an object...
entries.m_charge: i am tired of being scared, tired of being persecuted, tired of being oppressed... WTH... charge!
entries.a_rtg: ok ya'll. we ret to go
entries.a_follow_expire: need a map? better yet, why don't you just stay here and we will go do our thing...
entries.m_follow_expire: uh... its that big blue light shining down from the sky.. you go there... but since you took so long... laterz
entries.m_runaround: you lead us out to BFE and now you wanna talk? we should just kill you ourselves!
entries.a_runaround: you gave us the runaround for all that time, and now you want to come back to us? feh. die now.
